name: Block Puzzle Mania: Colorful Puzzle Travel - The most popular and hottest Block Puzzle Game
name_original: Block Puzzle Mania: Colorful Puzzle Travel - The most popular and hottest Block Puzzle Game
description:
Block Puzzle Mania is an amazing block puzzle game with a simple rule on the 10x10 puzzle board.

It was flattened after a fresh era of interesting puzzle game with simple rules but fun gameplay, the game also added several mysterious props, let you enjoy the ability to play a combination of elimination!

It's easy to learn and fun to play, it's a perfect mobile 1010 puzzle free game. You will play on the 10x10 board, try to get higher scores in the 3 different game modes!

******** Block Puzzle Mania Game Rules ********

- Drop blocks in order to create and destroy full lines both vertically and horizontally
- Keep the blocks from filling the 10x10 board

******** Block Puzzle Mania Game Features ********

- Diamond Rewards, higher score will get more diamonds
- More than 10 different and interesting block styles
- Items for you to get higher score

No time limit, no color match, only place the 100 blocks in the correct field on the 1010 puzzle board!

******** Block Puzzle Mania Game Modes ********

We provide you the other two special modes for your challenge, try to get more scores to unlock those two modes. They are more challenging, difficult, and exciting, also you will get higher scores in the Rock mode and Ice Mode.

- Arcade Mode: Drop blocks in order to create and destroy full lines both vertically and horizontally on the 1010 puzzle free board
- Advanced Mode: Kinds of props to help you eliminate the blocks
- Adventure Mode: Eliminate and level up! You'll unlock an interesting prop or block in every new level.

Block Puzzle Mania is the tangram-inspired puzzle game. Fill the board by dragging different shaped blocks into the correct place of 10x10 board to destroy a line.

Enjoy the Block Puzzle Mania game and let us know if you have any idea to this Block Puzzle Mania Game!
